pli-tv-bu-vb-sk63:6.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk63:6.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū yānagatassa dhammaṃ desenti …
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk63:7.2: “Na yānagatassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk63:8.2: vayhaṃ ratho sakaṭaṃ sandamānikā sivikā pāṭaṅkī.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk63:9.2: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca yānagatassa agilānassa dhammaṃ deseti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
